username_description: Make sure to pick a name that suits you! You will also use this username on VIP Live and VIP Clique as well so choose wisely.
security_verification_description: To fullfill the encryption please choose a 9+ character password
authenticator_description: Enter the 6 -digit code from VIP / Google Authenticator
public_private_description: Choose public if you will like to connect with others along your crypto journey, or choose private if you are a one man army.
privacy_info: Accept Payment from other VIP Wallet users.
public_description: Users will be able to search up your user name and have access to coins that you favorited.
private_description: Users will not be able to view your starred coins and profile, they will need to send you a friend request.
public_private_info: Transactions can be seen by anyone on blockchains. When your username is set to Public, users can see your transactions on the blockchain with your wallet address

enter_code: Enter the 4 -digit code sent to your email
protect_description: Choose your preferred method of security, the VIP team recommends you use both for maximum security.
face_id_description: Please make sure your face is clearly visible, so the facial recognition can work effectively.
backup_wallet_description: Please make sure you store your recovery phrase in a safe location. We recommend storing it offline on a peace of paper.
backup_now_desc: Please back up your wallet seed phrase. You will need it to access your tokens if you lose access to your phone or reset this application. Would you like to back up now?
backup_later_title: Are you sure you want to backup later?
backup_later_desc: It is recommended to back up now. If you lose access to your phone your seed phrase is the only way to restore your wallet. Please back up your 12 word seed phrase as soon as possible. Do you really want to back up later?
restore_wallet_description: Import an existing wallet using a 12-word recovery phrase.
sign_in_with_recovery_phrase: Sign in with a recovery phrase
sign_in_description: Access a pre existing wallet with a 12 - 24 word phrase key
recovery_phrase_description: The recovery phrase grants you full access to your wallet. Store it in a safe location.
do_not_share: Do not share this with anyone.
create_password_info: Make sure you don't lose this password VIP will not be able to reset it for you
create_password_description: To fulfill the encryption please choose a 9+ character password
enter_password_description: Please make sure your typing is accurate you will have to wait 3 minutes after 4 failed attempts.
